div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 917 Benkovski, 1933-1934 (145) Burial: c. 125-100 B.C. (T) Contents: c. 270 AR Maroneia: spread-flan tetradr. Thasos: spread-flan tetradr. Athens: New Style tetradr. Disposition: unknown Gerasimov, BIAB 8 (1934), p. 471 Thompson, Athens, p. 523
